TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class Animation : Java.Lang.Object, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, Java.Lang.ICloneable

type Animation = class inherit Object interface ICloneable interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IJavaPeerable
